term.title: interferent

item.text: Component of the matrix that embodies an influence quantity.

examples.item: In the analysis of arsenic using inductively coupled plasma-mass spectrometry at low mass resolution, the presence of chloride in the analytical sample causes the formation of _009522_Â which has the same _009524_ value of 75 as _009523_.

sources.item: PAC, 2021, 93, 997. 'Metrological and quality concepts in analytical chemistry (IUPAC Recommendations 2021)' on page 1006 (https://doi.org/10.1515/pac-2019-0819)

Users of these terms are encouraged to include the version of a term with its use and to check regularly for updates to term definitions that you are using.
